context.rdfs:comment: A financial product for the loaning of an amount of money under agreed terms and charges.
context.rdfs:label: LoanOrCredit

properties.rdfs:comment: The duration of the loan or credit agreement.

properties.rdfs:comment: Assets required to secure loan or credit repayments. It may take form of third party pledge, goods, financial instruments (cash, securities, etc.)
properties.rdfs:label: requiredCollateral
